programme.title: xXx
programme.desc: When NSA Agent Augustus Gibbons recruits Xander Cage, an extreme sports athlete, on a special mission, Cage finds himself obliged to find a way to combat a ruthless enemy.(n)

programme.title: xXx: State of the Union
programme.desc: (Darius Stone), a new agent for xXx program, is sent to Washington DC to defuse the power struggle between national leaders.(n)

programme.title: Beyond Skyline
programme.desc: A rigorous interrogator embarks on a brutal and unrelenting chase, trying to free his son from his hellish captivity in an alien warship.(n)

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: 30 years after what happened in the first movie LAPD officer K finds a secret that could cause chaos to society. During his investigation he finds former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who was missing for 30 years.(n)

programme.title: House at the End of the Street
programme.desc: After her parents separate, Elissa moves with her mother to their dream house in the country. But the dream is disturbed when they learn that the house at the end of their street was the scene of a violent crime where a girl killed her parents.(n)

programme.title: Paddington 2
programme.desc: Paddington is happily living with the Brown family in Windsor Gardens, where he becomes a popular member of the community. He finds a special book to give to his Aunt Lucy for her 100th birthday at Mr. Gruber's antique shop, and gets involved in a series of peculiar jobs to buy it.(n)

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: A chance meeting between William, a bookstore owner, and Anna Scott, the world-famous actress, sparks a love story after Anna enlists his help to hide from a tabloid scandal. But falling for the world's most desired woman is not easy, neither is the public scrutiny that comes with it.(n)

programme.title: House at the End of the Street
programme.desc: After her parents separate, Elissa moves with her mother to their dream house in the country. But the dream is disturbed when they learn that the house at the end of their street was the scene of a violent crime where a girl killed her parents.(n)

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: Frank Abagnale Jr. leaves his family's home at sixteen years old, and relies upon his cheque-forging abilities to make money, making up to two and a half million dollars. During that time, FBI agent Carl Hanratty, is after Frank, who seems to be always one step ahead.(n)

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: In the world of magic and optical illusions, the Four Horsemen face a tech genius who tries to exploit them, and they must clear their names before society and reveal the truth through one last stunt.(n)

programme.title: Knives Out
programme.desc: When the body of crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found, Detective Benoit Blanc takes charge of the crime investigation and finds himself involved in numerous events in search of the truth.(n)

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express
programme.desc: Hercule Poirot investigates the mysterious murder of a famous businessman on the Orient Express.(n)

programme.title: Birdman
programme.desc: Riggan Thomson is an actor with diminishing fame who once played an iconic superhero, he struggles to launch a Broadway play he wrote and wants to direct, while clashing with his family, his career and himself.(n)

programme.title: A United Kingdom
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film revolves around Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana (David Oyelowo), who caused a strong international uproar; when he married a white woman from London, Ruth Williams (Rosamund Pike), in the late 1940s.

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.

programme.title: My Week with Marilyn
programme.desc: A week in the life of the simple assistant director Colin Clark who accompanies Marilyn Monroe while filming The Prince and Show Girl in 1957, a week of passion, tension, fame, and interrelated relationships.

programme.title: Café Society
programme.desc: This is a love story about making choices at a time of uncertainty. When the Bronx native Bobby arrives to Hollywood, hoping to start a career in the film industry, he crosses paths with a lovely woman who just happens to be seeing a married man. Where does this leave them.

programme.title: A United Kingdom
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film revolves around Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana (David Oyelowo), who caused a strong international uproar; when he married a white woman from London, Ruth Williams (Rosamund Pike), in the late 1940s.

programme.title: Paul
programme.desc: A chance encounter between two nerds and an alien hanging out outside Area 51 leads to a high-stakes journey to return the alien to its spaceship before they all get caught by the FBI.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: In order to avoid unwanted comparisons with their own track records, the supervisors of skilled London officer Nicholas Angel banish him to the quiet small town of Sandford. But the small town soon becomes the location of some suspicious incidents that Angel is determined to get to the bottom of.

programme.title: This Is the End
programme.desc: James Franco invited many of his friends to attend his housewarming party in LA including Jonah Hill, Seth Rogen, Jay Baruchel, Craig Robinson, Michael Cera and others. Suddenly, during the party, the Biblical Apocalypse begins. They hide inside the house and try to survive the end of the world.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A horror comedy about two guys who have succeeded in remaining alive in the midst of a zombie outbreak. Their secret to survival: an alliance with sorcerers and a little bit of explosive firepower.(c)

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Columbus, Tallahasse, Wichita, and Little Rock move to the heart of America where they face surviving zombies, as well as the growing pains of the cynical substitute family.(n)

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: A love triangle brings together the brilliant medical student Michael, the attractive and sophisticated Ana, and the renowned photojournalist Chris. As the two men clash over Ana, they've to come together when public chaos follows the crumbling of the Ottoman Empire.(n)

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A horror comedy about two guys who have succeeded in remaining alive in the midst of a zombie outbreak. Their secret to survival: an alliance with sorcerers and a little bit of explosive firepower.(n)

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: In order to avoid unwanted comparisons with their own track records, the supervisors of skilled London officer Nicholas Angel banish him to the quiet small town of Sandford. But the small town soon becomes the location of some suspicious incidents that Angel is determined to get to the bottom of.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours to Live
programme.desc: After an experimental surgery that brings him back to life for one day, assassin killer, Travis Conrad has 24 hours to work with the team of women who killed him, seek revenge from the crime organization that was responsible for the murder of his wife and child, and seek personal redemption.(n)

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: An established cocaine dealer among England's Mafia elite seeks an early retirement, but his boss hands him an arduous task on the eve of his long-awaited retirement.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A fishing boat rescues a wounded man at sea who has lost his memory. He tries to regain it while dodging a group of professional hit-men.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Jason Bourne, a former CIA assassin suffering from psychogenic amnesia, wants to learn more of his past as he is once more enveloped in a conspiracy involving the CIA and Operation Treadstone and forced to continue is past life as an assasin for survival.(n)

programme.title: Motherless Brooklyn
programme.desc: Set in the 1950s, a private detective with Tourette's syndrome, Lionel Essrog, loses his only friend and mentor Frank Minna. Lionel then ventures into the slums of Brooklyn and Harlem to uncover the truth about his friend's death.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin in the middle of a war between two rival crime bosses. Put under surveillance by a detective and an assassin, he has to plan his move before they make their own.(n)

programme.desc: In order to avoid unwanted comparisons with their own track records, the supervisors of skilled London officer Nicholas Angel banish him to the quiet small town of Sandford. But the small town soon becomes the location of some suspicious incidents that Angel is determined to get to the bottom of.(n)

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Columbus, Tallahasse, Wichita, and Little Rock move to the heart of America where they face surviving zombies, as well as the growing pains of the cynical substitute family.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A fishing boat rescues a wounded man at sea who has lost his memory. He tries to regain it while dodging a group of professional hit-men.(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Sam and Molly's romance comes to a brutal end when Sam gets killed on the street by a thug. Left behind in spirit form, Sam enlists the help of a psychic to protect Molly from his former partner and the danger he poses to her.(n)

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
programme.desc: When the dwarves find and awaken Smaug the dragon, the battle of the five armies ensues, between the Goblins and the Wargs, against the Men of Lake-town, the Elves, the Dwarves, the Eagles and Beorn, over the control of Erebor and the treasure inside it.(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Lucy and her brother Edmund move to the magical world of Narnia, with their cousin Eustace, on board of a the ship of Prince Caspian The Dawn Treader. During their journey they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors , until they reach the edge of the world.(n)

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: A lighthouse keeper and his wife living off the coast of Western Australia, find a baby in a lifeboat. After they adopt the child, they learn later that a boat accident occurred at the same time they found the child and a woman tells them that she lost her husband and her child that day.(n)

programme.title: Grace of Monaco
programme.desc: The biopic of Hollywood starlet Grace Kelly, who married Prince Rainier III of Monaco in April 1956. The film tracks a particularly trying time, during a political dispute in the 1960s between Rainier and French President Charles De Gaulle.(n)

programme.title: Hello, My Name Is Doris
programme.desc: When Doris becomes infatuated with her much younger co-worker John, her crush leads her to experience life in a way that she has never known before. As she braves criticism from everyone around her, she puts her heart on the line since her crush may be one-sided.

programme.title: Help, I Shrunk My Friends
programme.desc: After the new girl Melanie arrives at Felix's school, he falls for her, which upsets his friends. But when they ruin Felix's date with Melanie, he involuntarily shrinks them, thus bringing about a drastic chain of events.

programme.title: The Machinist
programme.desc: Trevor Reznik, a machinist, suffers from a severe case of insomnia that has begun to affect his health. When an unfamiliar co-worker causes him to accidentally injure another co-worker, he begins to believe that he is deliberately trying to drive him insane, as he spirals into paranoia and delusion.

programme.title: Gossip Girl S5
programme.desc: As Blair plans her wedding, she has to reckon with her feelings for Chuck, which brings about unforeseen tragic consequences. Meanwhile, Serena tries to prove herself on the movie set and decide on the direction she wants her life to take.

programme.title: Bringing Down the House
programme.desc: Peter Sanderson is a lawyer who's divorced living with his kids . He meets a woman named Charlene, who escaped from prison after being accused of armed robbery. Peter tries to stay away from her, but she asks for his help in proving her innocence, and refuses to leave until he does.

programme.title: Dogman
programme.desc: The mild-mannered dog groomer Marcello decides to put an end to the crimes of the thuggish former boxer Simone, who forces him to do petty crimes and terrorizes the whole neighborhood.

programme.title: Survivor
programme.desc: A Foreign Service Officer who has recently been employed in the American embassy in London is charged with the mission to stop a terrorist attack targeting spots in New York city. But when she gets falsely charged with crimes she did not commit, she is forced to go on the run, trying to clear her name and also continue her original mission.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne has a close call with a corrupt C.I.A offical and his group of agents in a new assassination program. At the same time, he looks for answers about his life as a professional hit-man.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: In the fourth Jason Bourne feature film, a unique agent, Aaron Cross, is enrolled in an enhanced US Defense Department black ops program "Operation Outcome". Agents are given chemical pills to genetically amplify their abilities. After the older programs are publicly exposed, CIA directors are investigated followed by a decision to shut down Outcome and eliminate all its agents and scientists.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A runaway train carrying toxic chemicals must be stopped before it derails and kills everyone in town. Its up to a train conductor and engineer (Denzel Washington and Chris Pine) to stop the train in time.

programme.title: The Power of Few
programme.desc: Across multiple viewpoints, five people experience one fateful afternoon that sees a religious conspiracy intertwining with a smuggling operation in a way that leaves everyone reeling.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Businessman John Hammond opens a wildlife park containing cloned dinosaurs, but when a power failure causes the dinosaurs to roam freely, a group of visitors struggle to escape the lethal creatures.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Jason Bourne is chased by the CIA once again after former CIA operative Nicky Parsons is out to expose the CIA's black ops. Director Dewey sends CIA agent, Heather Lee to catch them both.

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: A victim of domestic abuse,Anna Poliatova, accepts an offer to become an undercover KGB assassin while working as a model. She shows indelible strength and fearsome determination to reach one goal: her freedom. But first, Anna must survive the conflicting agendas of the KGB and the CIA.

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: This film takes place in 1970s London; Terry Leather is a salesmen, happily married with children, and few secrets to keep. When an old friend, Martine Love, offers up a scheme to make some quick cash, Terry finds himself unable to refuse. With the help of a carefully selected crew including Kevin Swain and David Shilling, they rent a warehouse on Baker Street and begin tunneling to the nearby Loyd Bank. With their eye on the money stored in the bank’s safety deposit boxes, the crew finds themselves in for much more than they bargained.

programme.title: The Warrior Queen of Jhansi
programme.desc: The epic tale of the heroism of Rani of Jhansi, the Indian queen who became a fearless freedom fighter who led her people into battle against the British Empire in 1857.

programme.desc: In order to secure the life of his daughter and regain her custody from social services, a bouncer in his fifties has to take a mission to help the Interpol bring a crime lord to justice.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: An elite hitman is successful working in the shadows. Now he's teaching his trade to an apprentice who is related to one of his previous victims.

programme.desc: No good deed goes unpunished. That proves true for three outlaw brothers who are hired by a desperate woman to rescue her godson from an abusive stepfather, only to find themselves hunted by federal agents, mobsters, and assassins.

programme.desc: Three friends travel to Havana, Cuba, to investigate the origins of a mysterious manuscript supposedly written by the famous American writer Ernest Hemingway; they find themselves in a deadly cat and mouse game after being trapped in an abandoned building in the town center.

programme.desc: When the fatally-ill Martha moves into a retirement community to spend her last days in peace, the last thing she expects is for her fun-loving neighbor to convince her that there's still time to revive her old dream of being a cheerleader.

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: On an isolated island off the Scottish coast, three lighthouse keepers come across a trunk loaded with gold, and their paranoia and greed lead them into a battle for survival.

programme.title: Peace, Love & Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Brought down by her impending divorce, Diane seeks a break by taking her two children to visit her estranged hippie mother. What starts as a weekend gateway might just end up what mends her relationship with her mother and heals her broken heart.
Set in the 21st century; the lives of a number of strangers from all over the world are connected and influenced by one another through a series of random encounters.

programme.title: Drunk Parents
programme.desc: The married couple Frank and Nancy find themselves in a bind, after facing financial difficulties that make them unable to pay for their daughter's education. They attempt to figure out a way to fix the situation, while hiding their problem from everyone around them.

programme.title: Valley of the Gods
programme.desc: As John Ecas tries to move on from a broken relationship, he decides to write the novel he has always dreamed of writing, only to run into an eccentric trillionaire and form a relationship that turns him into a biographer for the reclusive man.

programme.title: Arctic
programme.desc: In the wake of a plane crash, a man gets stranded in the Arctic. Faced with a frozen wasteland and dangerous prospectives, he has to make the difficult choice between remaining in his current camp or venturing out into the frozen wilderness looking for rescue.

programme.title: The Ides of March
programme.desc: The film revolves around the US presidential elections, which is based on deception, with a specific look at US party policies, through the old legacies about corruption related to power, and it reveals an important investigation about the troubles of public life in America.

programme.title: Rosie
programme.desc: Forced into homelessness when their landlord sells their house, a mother desperately tries to shield her children from the harsh reality of their situation as she tries to find a place for them to stay.

programme.title: Love Happens
programme.desc: This picture is a romantic drama that was written and directed by Brandon Camp. The film stars Jennifer Aniston and Aaron Eckhart. Burke Ryan (Aaron Eckhart) is full of grief. His wife has lost her life in an auto accident and he has yet to overcome her loss. In an attempt to help himself, Ryan writes a book about ways to deal with grief. While holding a workshop in his deceased wife’s hometown of Seattle, he meets Eloise (Jennifer Aniston). Despite being an “expert” on the topic, Ryan is nonetheless not dealing well with the loss of his wife – he will need all the help that Eloise can give him in order to overcome that trauma and find happiness again.

programme.desc: The married couple Frank and Nancy find themselves in a bind, after facing financial difficulties that make them unable to pay for their daughter's education. They attempt to figure out a way to fix the situation, while hiding their problem from everyone around them.

programme.title: Arctic
programme.desc: In the wake of a plane crash, a man gets stranded in the Arctic. Faced with a frozen wasteland and dangerous prospectives, he has to make the difficult choice between remaining in his current camp or venturing out into the frozen wilderness looking for rescue.
Set in the 21st century; the lives of a number of strangers from all over the world are connected and influenced by one another through a series of random encounters.

programme.title: Peace, Love & Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Brought down by her impending divorce, Diane seeks a break by taking her two children to visit her estranged hippie mother. What starts as a weekend gateway might just end up what mends her relationship with her mother and heals her broken heart.

programme.title: Poms
programme.desc: When the fatally-ill Martha moves into a retirement community to spend her last days in peace, the last thing she expects is for her fun-loving neighbor to convince her that there's still time to revive her old dream of being a cheerleader.

programme.title: Valley of the Gods
programme.desc: As John Ecas tries to move on from a broken relationship, he decides to write the novel he has always dreamed of writing, only to run into an eccentric trillionaire and form a relationship that turns him into a biographer for the reclusive man.

programme.title: Arctic
programme.desc: In the wake of a plane crash, a man gets stranded in the Arctic. Faced with a frozen wasteland and dangerous prospectives, he has to make the difficult choice between remaining in his current camp or venturing out into the frozen wilderness looking for rescue.

programme.title: Love Happens
programme.desc: This picture is a romantic drama that was written and directed by Brandon Camp. The film stars Jennifer Aniston and Aaron Eckhart. Burke Ryan (Aaron Eckhart) is full of grief. His wife has lost her life in an auto accident and he has yet to overcome her loss. In an attempt to help himself, Ryan writes a book about ways to deal with grief. While holding a workshop in his deceased wife’s hometown of Seattle, he meets Eloise (Jennifer Aniston). Despite being an “expert” on the topic, Ryan is nonetheless not dealing well with the loss of his wife – he will need all the help that Eloise can give him in order to overcome that trauma and find happiness again.

programme.title: Rosie
programme.desc: Forced into homelessness when their landlord sells their house, a mother desperately tries to shield her children from the harsh reality of their situation as she tries to find a place for them to stay.

programme.title: The Ides of March
programme.desc: The film revolves around the US presidential elections, which is based on deception, with a specific look at US party policies, through the old legacies about corruption related to power, and it reveals an important investigation about the troubles of public life in America.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: During the time of the Roman empire, Emperor Marcus Aurelius decides that his heir will be General Maximus. However, his son, Commodus, murders him before he has a chance to act on his decision, and he becomes the Emperor after his father. Commodus then decides that Maximus must be killed, who in a turn of events, becomes a gladiator and a hero in people's eyes.

programme.title: Sweetness in the Belly
programme.desc: As she flees the civil war in Ethiopia, Lilly seeks refuge in her parents' homeland in England, quickly finding purpose as she seeks to reunite people with their families with the help of her friend Amina, all while hiding her relationship with the doctor, Aziz.

programme.title: Beatriz at Dinner
programme.desc: When her car breaks down at a client's house, health practitioner Beatriz accepts her client's invitation to join her for dinner, only to end up butting heads with an arrogant billionaire who comes from a world completely different from her own.

programme.title: The Way Back
programme.desc: Set in the beginning of the 1940's, three men escape from the Siberian militant camps in Russia and cross over all the way to India, a distance estimated to be around 4000 miles. During their journey, they are joined by a teenage girl and four other men, on a near-impossible mission.(n)
